oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dr. David Ramsay
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Portrait paintings; Men; Surgery; Politicians
Ramsay, David, 1749-1815
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Ramsay, from South Carolina, was a field surgeon in the Revolutionary army, a delegate to Continental Congress, and a historian. After the war, he published a biography of George Washington and histories of the Revolution.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Colonial Dames of America Portraits in Tennessee Painted Before 1866 Photograph Collection
